system.description: The character can direct their bestial minions to attack vulnerable targets they've already engaged.
system.benefit: As a Reaction, after hitting a ranged or melee attack, character can make +0 Wrangling Test. If successful one of their Bestial Minions gain +20 to the next Attack Action made against that target until the end of its next turn.

rollConfig.description: Wrangling Test to coordinate minion attack

specialAbilities.name: Minion Coordination
specialAbilities.description: As a Reaction after hitting an attack, make a Wrangling Test. On success, one Bestial Minion gains +20 to attack that target until end of its next turn.
